de.thkoeln.bibl.api.lms.slnp

Class SLNPClient<N extends AbstractMediaNumber>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.thkoeln.bibl.api.lms.slnp.SLNPClient<N>
  • Type Parameters:
    N - the media number type the client creates
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Searchable<SisisMedia<N>>

    public class SLNPClient<N extends AbstractMediaNumber>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Searchable<SisisMedia<N>>
    Class implements a SLNP client to communicate with a LMS. The class supports multiple SLNP connections to optimize the response time for media lookups.
    Author:
    Patrick Rogalla

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      SLNPClient(java.lang.Class<N> mediaNrClass, SLNPConnection con)
      Initialize a SLNPClient with the supplied SLNPConnection object.

      Initialize a SLNPClient with the supplied connection and login information.

      Checks if at least one connection to the LMS is connected.

      Returns a library media object from the LMS specified by the ID or null if no corresponding object was found by the LMS

      Opens all underlying SLNP connections.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,SisisMedia<N>> searchMedia(java.lang.String signature)
      Returns a map of library media objects from the LMS found by the string, indexed by the media signature.

      Sets the maximum connections a client can open in parallel.

                  SLNPConnection con)
           throws java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException
        Initialize a SLNPClient with the supplied SLNPConnection object.
        Parameters:
        mediaNrClass - the media number class for which the client builds the media
        con - the SLNP connection used for communication
        Throws:
        java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException - if the supplied media number class dosn't support the required initialization function

                  java.lang.String host,
                  int port,
                  Credentials cred)
           throws java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException
        Initialize a SLNPClient with the supplied connection information and login credentials.
        Parameters:
        mediaNrClass - the media number class for which the client builds the media
        host - the host address to connect to
        port - the port to connect to
        cred - the credentials to use for authentication
        Throws:
        java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException - if the supplied media number class dosn't support the required initialization function

      • SLNPClient

        public SLNPClient(java.lang.Class<N> mediaNrClass,
                  java.lang.String host,
                  int port,
                  java.lang.String user,
                  java.lang.String pass,
                  int branchId)
           throws java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException
        Initialize a SLNPClient with the supplied connection and login information.
        Parameters:
        mediaNrClass - the media number class for which the client builds the media
        host - the host address to connect to
        port - the port to connect to
        user - the username to use for the login process
        pass - the password to use for the login process
        branchId - the branch ID to use for the login process
        Throws:
        java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException - if the supplied media number class dosn't support the required initialization function

      • getSearchLimit

        public int getSearchLimit()
        Returns the search limit.
        Returns:
        the search limit

      • setSearchLimit

        public void setSearchLimit(int limit)
        Sets the limit for each media search. A single search request will never request more results than this limit.
        Parameters:
        limit - maximum results per search

      • getConnectionLimit

        public int getConnectionLimit()
        Returns the connection limit.

        Sets the maximum connections a client can open in parallel.
        Parameters:
        limit - maximum connections

                throws java.net.SocketException
        Sets the SLNPConnection timeout.
        Parameters:
        timeout - the timeout in milliseconds
        Throws:

      • searchMedia

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,SisisMedia<N>> searchMedia(java.lang.String signature)
                                                          throws LMSException
        Description copied from interface: Searchable
        Returns a map of library media objects from the LMS found by the string, indexed by the media signature. The signature supports wildcard pattern.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a map of library media objects
        Throws:
        LMSException - if a exception occurred in the LMS back-end while searching for the media
